issue.title: [C++][Compute] Add string translate kernel
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-13825](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13825). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Create compute function for string translate, similar to [Python's str.translate](https://docs.python.org/3/library/stdtypes.html#str.translate), [SQL TRANSLATE](https://www.w3schools.com/sqL/func_sqlserver_translate.asp).

(also see [PostgreSQL docs](https://www.postgresql.org/docs/current/functions-string.html#FUNCTIONS-STRING-OTHER))
